PLEASE TEXT TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT  show contact info  Jackson Mobile Home Park 2240 Brooklyn Rd Jackson MI 49203  Please Note: -You will need Picture Identification as well as a Social Security Card -There is a fee $35.00 per adult for the Community Background, Credit, Criminal, Landlord and Employment verification and investigations. -  FAQ's Q. How much is the security deposit? A. The Security Deposit is One and One Half Times the expected first full months rent and does not take into account any promotions that maybe discounted upon tenancy and move in.  Q. Do you always have rentals available? A. Not always, so please look for the initial response which will typically tell you if for some reason or another there is no rental available at the time of your inquiry.  Q. What Appliances are Included in rentals? A. Typically a Stove and Refrigerator, sometimes a clothes washer and dryer, sometimes a dish washer.  Q. Are there applicants that you will not consider? A. No, All applications are taken into consideration and all aspects of the application are taken into consideration including the credit worthiness of all adult applicants, civil and criminal background of all applicants, payment history, landlord history, employment history and income.  Q. Are felonies an automatic disqualification? A. No, all aspects of the criminal background are taken into consideration.  Q. Do you allow Service Animals? A. Yes, Service animals are allowed.  Q. Is there a fee For Service Animals? A. No, there is no additional fee for service animals?  Q. What is needed to move in? A. The following items are needed prior to move in:  A. Approved Application  B. Initial documentation such as a move in acknowledgement etc, all necessary community registrations.  C. Once all the initial documentation is gathered and you are cleared to move forward with lease signing you would have to make sure that you have renters content insurance and or home owners insurance depending on if you own or rent.  D. Utilities turned on in your name.  E. A confirmed inspection that is acceptable to both you and the community to make sure the unit is good working condition  F. A final all clear to move forward with a lease agreement  G. Finally an Authorization to occupy the premises. (Please keep in mind that the move in process requires time for inspections and utilities to be turned on and some times a second inspection etc, so there is no "move in today" type of an option. If you are looking for the fastest and most efficient move in process, simply get accepted first, then follow the steps necessary to remove all items from the check list that is given to you at the time of acceptance and the process will be relatively smooth and painless). We always do our best to move quickly for you.  Q. Do you accept cash? A. No, cash is never accepted, (For your safety and the safety of the caretaker no cash is ever accepted for payment at anytime for any reason whatsoever)  Q. Can I pay by credit card or Debit Card? A. Yes you can pay by credit card and or debit card? certain fees may apply.  Q. What Other Charge(s) are the renter responsible for? A. Water - Sewer and Trash included in Rent amount. You pay for Rent Plus Gas and electric Gas and Electric is billed through the local Public Utility Provider  Are you ready to schedule an appointment?  Do have your photo ID and SS card ready? This is the largest one bedroom apartment we have. While I did not measure it, my guess is the apartment is 20 X 50. There are not many 1,000 sq ft one bedroom apartments in Mitchell.  Another Mitchell Landlord is advertising new construction, 720 sq ft for $700 with you paying the heat and electricity. Since their's is a multi-family building, you would have other tenants on both sides of you, on top of you, across the hall from you and underneath you, plus to get to your unreserved parking spot you have to walk down the hall, out the front door, down the sidewalk and across the parking lot.   This huge one bedroom has a reserved carport parking space within 20 feet of the private front door, plus we pay all utilities except your cable and internet. BUT WAIT THERE IS MORE! There is a double sound wall (walls 4' apart with only air in the middle) between you and the other two tenants in the building. This apartment should be quiet and it is remote, as your parking spot and front door are off the alley and not facing the busy street. Short one block walk to the theater and downtown coffee shops.           The painting was finished Friday...carpet and vinyl will be installed Monday and Tuesday. We set the toilet, bring in the appliances and you can move in on Wednesday. If you like the smell of fresh paint, carpet and vinyl, this is the apartment for you. The owners who have enjoyed this nicely-appointed ranch home hate to give it up but their job relocation translates to a New Location for you! Single-floor living starts at the front door with an inviting, light-filled living room and extends to the large dining room and the big eat-in kitchen featuring a contemporary neutral color scheme, stainless steel appliances, laminate flooring and lots of great cabinet and counter space. First floor also includes 2 full baths, laundry area, and 3 good-sized bedrooms, one of which includes an en suite bathroom with step-in shower. With a close-in location like this and such an attractive price, you might expect single-floor living to be the endgame here. But there's also a full finished basement, with huge family room, lots of great storage, plus an extra office or potential 4th bedroom. Rounding this opportunity is a 2 car-garage, big front yard, a backyard flat as the Texas panhandle (playset conveys), and the quietest neighborhood this side of the Mississippi (ATO). What's not to love?

You can also get some work done in our Business Center while sipping on an invigorating latte from our Coffee Bar. With our spacious designs and central location - right off U.S. Route 1, our apartments are close to The University of South Carolina, The Riverbanks Botanical Garden & Zoo, and a variety of dining, shopping, and entertainment options.
